title: Fix and enable again ReactiveMongodbPanacheResourceTest#testMoreRepositoryFunctionalities
body:
This test has been flaky for ages. See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pulls?q=is%3Apr+testMoreRepositoryFunctionalities for occurrences of the issue.

```
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3686601Z 2023-08-22 03:08:08,203 ERROR [io.qua.ver.htt.run.QuarkusErrorHandler] (executor-thread-1) HTTP Request to /test/reactive/repository failed, error id: 60f3e0ff-93af-4b3b-9ade-d421fc12aa80-2: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <5> but was: <0>
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3712321Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.build(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:151)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3718657Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertionFailureBuilder.buildAndThrow(AssertionFailureBuilder.java:132)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3872819Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.failNotEqual(AssertEquals.java:197)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3883412Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:150)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3885237Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertEquals.assertEquals(AssertEquals.java:145)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3898395Z 	at org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals(Assertions.java:528)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3900240Z 	at io.quarkus.it.mongodb.panache.test.TestResource.testReactiveRepository(TestResource.java:677)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.3901668Z 	at io.quarkus.it.mongodb.panache.test.TestResource$quarkusrestinvoker$testReactiveRepository_77d864869c09c3cd16252ec566c77d75a2e2b5f9.invoke(Unknown Source)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.4127374Z 	at org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.server.handlers.InvocationHandler.handle(InvocationHandler.java:29)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.4130144Z 	at io.quarkus.resteasy.reactive.server.runtime.QuarkusResteasyReactiveRequestContext.invokeHandler(QuarkusResteasyReactiveRequestContext.java:141)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.4132603Z 	at org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.common.core.AbstractResteasyReactiveContext.run(AbstractResteasyReactiveContext.java:147)
2023-08-22T03:08:08.4161567Z 	at io.quarkus.vertx.core.runtime.VertxCoreRecorder$14.runWith(VertxCoreRecorder.java:578)
```
